title: Did anyone try to kill King George VI? - Quora
tags: King George VI of the United Kingdom

response.answer_text: Other than the Germans during the blitz? Not really. There was an IRA bombing a few bocks away from them during the King and Queen's visit to Belfast in 1937, just after his coronation, but not close enough to him to be a serious threat, although it was considered an assassination attempt gone wrong.
